content: round 3 thumb stitches between markers for both the right and left glove continue in pattern as follows round 23-24 row 3 - 4 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 25 row 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl m m1r k to second marker m1l sl m k to end of round 5 thumb stitches between markers round 26 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b cf2 p2 k to end of round round 27 row 3 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 28 row 4 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl m m1r k to second marker m1l sl m k to end of round 7 thumb stitches between markers round 29 row 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 30 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b cf2 p2 k end of round round 31 row 3 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl m m1r k to second marker m1l sl m k to end of round 9 thumb stitches between markers round 33-34 row 4 - 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to end of round round 35 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b cf2 p2 k to end of round round 36 row 3 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl m m1r k to second marker m1l sl m k to end of round 11 thumb stitches between markers all rights reserved © 2023 hava some yarn personal use only round 37 row 4 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k end of round round 38 row 1 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first maker sl m m1r k to second marker m1l sl m k to end of round 13 thumb stitches between markers round 39 row 2 of chart k1 p2 c2b cf2 p2 k to end of round round 40 row 3 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k end of round round 41 row 4 of chart k1 p2 k8 p2 k to first marker move the 13 thumb stitches to waste yarn co 3 stitches k to end of round repeat cable chart pattern 5 more times glove should measure 2 ¾ from the 3 co stitches in round 41 round 50 bind off all stitches loosely in pattern for the left and right glove thumb transfer all stitches from the waste yarn onto needles pick up 5 additional stitches along the cast on edge total of 18 stitches on needles and place marker for beginning of round round 1 k13 k2tog k1 k2tog 16 stitches round 2 k to end of round round 3 k2tog k11 k2tog k1 14 stitches round 4-6 k to end of round round 7 bind off all stitches loosely in pattern all rights reserved © 2023 hava some yarn personal
